thread.title: Woman Wears Chewbacca Mask During Labor, And You Really Have To See It
thread.title_full: Woman Wears Chewbacca Mask During Labor, And You Really Have To See It

author: James Gould-Bourn
title: Woman Wears Chewbacca Mask During Labor, And You Really Have To See It
text: Woman Wears Chewbacca Mask During Labor, And You Really Have To See It 1k+ views James Gould-Bourn BoredPanda staff Giving birth isn’t exactly known for being a particularly hilarious event, but one mom from Detroit, US was determined to have as much fun as possible by going through her contractions while wearing a Chewbacca mask. Show Full Text As you can see from the video below, the mask, which was first made famous by Candace Payne, otherwise known as “Chewbacca Mom”, translates all of Katie Stricker Curtis’s cries into the Wookie language known as Shyriiwook. It probably didn’t help to abate the pain much, but it certainly gave everybody else a good laugh! Katie uploaded the video to Facebook after giving birth to her son Jayden, and it’s already been viewed more than 210k times. “Just because I’m about to be a mom doesn’t mean I have to grow up!” She wrote. “Never take life too seriously!” Thanks for sharing!
